thread.title: Michelle Obama Wishes Her 'Favorite Dance Partner' A Happy Birthday
thread.title_full: Michelle Obama Wishes Her 'Favorite Dance Partner' A Happy Birthday

author: Paige Lavender
title: Michelle Obama Wishes Her 'Favorite Dance Partner' A Happy Birthday
text:
Michelle Obama Wishes Her 'Favorite Dance Partner' A Happy Birthday A . Paige Lavender Senior Politics Editor, The Huffington Post Posted: 08/04/2015 04:04 PM EDT | Edited: 2 hours ago 
First lady Michelle Obama wished her husband and "favorite dance partner," President Barack Obama, a happy birthday on Tuesday. 
Obama celebrated his 54th birthday. Happy birthday to a loving husband, wonderful father and my favorite dance partner. 54 looks good on you, @POTUS ! -mo pic.twitter.com/B2JSxCTcCo â€” The First Lady (@FLOTUS) August 4, 2015 
Also on HuffPost: Sasha, Malia, Michelle & Barack Obama of
